K-Pop Playlist Automation

Description

This project is a command-line tool that I built to extract real-time top music chart data from multiple websites. It uses BeautifulSoup4 for web scraping and Selenium WebDriver for dynamic content extraction. Additionally, I leveraged the Spotify Web API to seamlessly query songs, add them to playlists, and automate the creation of playlists directly in a userâ€™s Spotify account.

You can check out the project on GitHub.

Technologies Used:

Python, BeautifulSoup4, Selenium WebDriver, Spotipy
